refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
An extension that sub-classes nautilus.ColumnProvider will be asked to provide a list of custom columns back to Nautilus, which are then displayed when the user is in List mode. Nautilus does this by calling each extension's get_columns method, which returns a list of nautilus.Column.
An extension sub-classing nautilus.ColumnProvider will almost always want to sub-class nautilus.InfoProvider as well, since that is how an extension provides information for each item in a directory listing.
